mapper.select: select id, user_id, category_id, title, details, price, images, status, view_count, location, create_time, update_time from item where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (user_id, category_id, title, details, price, images, status, view_count, location, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{details}, #{price}, #{images, typeHandler=com.fleafair.Handler.StringListTypeHandler}, #{status, typeHandler=com.fleafair.Handler.ItemStatusHandler}, #{viewCount}, #{location}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM item ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1000 -- 先按时间取最近的 1000 条 ) AS recent_items ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 100 -- 再随机取 100 条
